column4: hello experts, can somebody guide me to solve many problems of ubuntu 9.04 regarding compatibility with my laptop ?

Try to search on google and see if you find something. http://www.google.com/search?q=Toshiba+Satellite+A110+ubuntu
brother I have made so much research on google, but I couldn't solve these 5 problems.
